review: great atmospheric pointandclick puzzlesolving game in the tradition of myst  puzzles focus on closely observing the objects and a bit of logic but not frustratingly so hints help when one is stuck while not providing an explicit solution  very enjoyable even though theres low immediate replay value  ill probably pick it up again in a year or so when ive forgotten all solutions
